short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks UPS, FedEx and USPS packages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select USPS, UPS or FedEx tracking number within a web page, right-click to bring up a pop-up menu, click the "Track..." option and corresponding tracking information will open in a new browser tab.
